product.Name: Day Cream
product.INCI: Aqua, Aloe barbadensis Leaf Juice, Propanediol, Caprylic/Capric Triglycerides, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Glycerin, Glyceryl Monostearate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Butter Extract (Ghee), Tocopherol, Potassium Sorbate, Benzyl Alcohol Dehydroacetic Acid, Xanthan gum, Lonicera Caprifolium Extract
product.Description: MIRATI Day Cream is based on organic Ghee, organic Aloe vera and honeysuckle essential oil extracted from flowers and shrubs of Lonicera periclymenum. The cream is perfectly suited for nourishing the skin while enveloping in the most pleasant aromatic experience. nEnriched with vitamin E the cream also carries anti-oxidizing properties that the skin needs for protection.
